sentences.en: A moment later, Cohen picked up the phone. "Hello?"
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，科恩接起电话。“喂？”

sentences.en: Any minute now, that phone is going to ring.
sentences.cn: 那部电话随时可能响。

sentences.en: Do you have an address and phone number for him?
sentences.cn: 你有他的地址和电话号码么？

sentences.en: For information phone 8279-3772.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情请拨打8279-3772。

sentences.en: He had shouted down the phone at her, beside himself with anxiety.
sentences.cn: 他焦急万分地对着电话那头的她大喊大叫。

sentences.en: He's constantly on the phone to his girlfriend being soppy.
sentences.cn: 他总是卿卿我我地跟女朋友煲电话粥。

sentences.en: I answered the phone and this voice went, "Hello? Is that Alison?"
sentences.cn: 我拿起电话，就听到这个声音：“喂？是艾利森吗？”

sentences.en: I got this phone call from a gentleman, who seemed sincere enough.
sentences.cn: 这个电话是一位绅士打来的，他似乎非常诚恳。

sentences.en: I kept phoning her up, asking to meet her.
sentences.cn: 我不断给她打电话，要求见她一面。

sentences.en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
sentences.cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

sentences.en: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.cn: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

sentences.en: I’ll phone you this evening.
sentences.cn: 今晚我会给你打电话。

sentences.en: If the phone rings say you'll call back after dinner.
sentences.cn: 如果有电话打来，就说你吃完饭再回电话。

sentences.en: Just phone in your order three or more days prior to departure.
sentences.cn: 在出发的三天之前打电话预订即可。

sentences.en: Much of his work is done by phone .
sentences.cn: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.en: On another occasion I answered the phone and the line went dead.
sentences.cn: 还有一回，我一接电话，就掉线了。

sentences.en: She took part in a BBC radio phone-in programme.
sentences.cn: 她参加了英国广播公司听众来电参与节目。

sentences.en: She was constantly on the phone, ladling out inside details to reporters.
sentences.cn: 她经常打电话向记者们提供大把内幕消息。

sentences.en: Simon finished dialing and clamped the phone to his ear.
sentences.cn: 西蒙拨完号，把听筒贴在耳边。

sentences.en: Stevie phoned to say that he was going to be late.
sentences.cn: 史蒂维打来电话说他要迟到了。

sentences.en: Tell him to phone back (= telephone again at a later time ) tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 叫他明天再打电话来。

sentences.en: Unable to restrain herself, she rose and went to the phone.
sentences.cn: 她没能克制住自己，起身走向电话。

sentences.en: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.cn: 谁来的电话？

sentences.en: Why didn’t they phone the police?
sentences.cn: 他们为什么没给警察打电话？

trans.tran_cn: 电话，听筒，（发声或使用声音的）工具，说某种语言的

trans.tran_en: to speak to someone by telephone
